title: Ghost Recon Island Thunder XBOX NTSC
description:
Published by:                      Ubisoft
Developed by:                    Red Storm Entertainment
Region:                               NTSC
Genre:                                 First-Person Shooter
Number of Players:             1-16 (Xbox Live only)
Release Date:                     August 5, 2003
ESRB Content Descriptors: Mild Realistic Violence

Cautiously, you creep through the jungle, the hostile compound spreading out before you. Silently, you signal actions to your teams. Alpha slowly crawls downhill while Bravo sets up support. Your sniper moves to a secure location, searching for hostiles. Suddenly, tracers light up the ground in front of you. You&#039;ve been spotted. Analyzing the situation, you instruct one team to flank the enemy group while the other lays down suppressive fire. After clearing the compound, you grab the package, check for wounded, and then make your way to the next objective -- ghost-like. Standalone campaign disk release (doesn&#039;t require the original Ghost Recon) featuring new single- and multiplayer maps
